attributes.title: Worst App Ever Made
attributes.review: SAD I downloaded this app to learn more about Donald Trump before the election and I found out some super unsettling facts. This is a mind-numbing individual and campaign. In order to be one of the sheep that follow this man, your education has to be below that of a kindergartener. This is the worst app ever in terms of layout and functionality and I am pretty certain it gave my phone a virus so thanks a lot!! Now I need to hard start my phone every time I have to text someone.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD⚠️
attributes.review: There are so many things wrong with this app. First of all according to the rest of the comments it takes days to download even with great WiFi. We need to shut this app down. If you know what’s good for your country you will place a bad review. We need to take down this app. We will battle towards making America what it used to be. We will fight against trump until we don’t need to. Please help us during this battle so we may win the war.

attributes.title: THIS APP BROKE MY TOE‼️‼️
attributes.review: after i downloaded the app i opened it up. not to mention it’s runs really bad. when i opened it there was this LOUD sound and it sent a vibration to the haptic of my phone. it vibrated so much it vibrated out of my hand and fell onto my toe!!! keep in mind i have a big bulky juicy hard c0ck case on my phone and my phone is already a plus size so this hurt like a buttcheek on a stick. DO NOT DOWNLOAD !!! ‼️‼️there’s a possibility this freaks accident can happen to you too cause of this app!!!!

attributes.title: the app is horrible!
attributes.review:
so as soon as i downloaded the app, IT ASKED ME FOR MY PHONE NUMBER. like... please take me out to dinner first.
after that, my device was glitching and shutting down the app. I kept getting back on, even when i wasnt on the app, it still glitched a whole bunch. i deleted it and my whole device shut down for a full 64 hours!! I redownloaded it just to write this review. this app has messed up my almost 600 dollar device. please do NOT get this app 😾😾😾👎👎💕🦖

attributes.title: Horrible 🤢🤮
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to check it out and immediately I started getting racist and pedo vibes from the picture of the man on it. Oh I forgot that’s our president sorry. Anyways Donald trump is a horrible person and his racist supporters or just dumb supporters are just wrong. How do they not realize what he’s done and still support him yet claim they themselves aren’t racist? Anyways trump has done other horrible things beyond racism and I’m pretty sure he was money laundering at once.

attributes.title: absolutely TERRIBLE.
attributes.review: I downloaded the app even though I am a Democrat, just to see if perhaps my view on trump could be changed. First of all, the app took 69 weeks to download. When it finally did download, I opened the app to an immediate death threat saying to vote Trump 2020. When I deleted the app because of that, ALL of my TV’s switched to a picture of President Trump while blasting the National Anthem. Right after this, all of the TV’s in my house EXPLODED. I do not recommend this app whatsoever. DO NOT GET IT.

attributes.title: The WORST app ever
attributes.review: I wish I could say the other reviews were exaggerating but they’re NOT in the least bit and future users should read them diligently. If only I had listened... this app not only slowed down my phone and rendered it a piece of crap but also allowed Chinese and Russian hackers to have access to my information. This is downright unacceptable and I am fuming. I will never forgive Trump for this and I wonder how he can sleep at night knowing he’s ruining people’s LIVES 😡

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: First of all the app is better off without signing in because what if you don’t have an email?? Second of all I only voted for trump in the real election because I didn’t want to have Hillary as a president. Third of all, I used to support trump and now all the stuff is going to do and has done has made me not support him anymore. I used to love looking at his orange face but now it just looks like a BIG OLE CHEETO. He is a liar and he has just made the world even worse.

attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER
attributes.review:
i tried to order something for one of my friends but the order never came🤢. It took my money and I didn’t get a refund either. I WILL NEVER GET ANOTHER THING FROM THIS. It’s a 0/10 would never recommend to anyone at all. 😤

But like seriously who really let the man take my money and not give me a refund. I want my money back and/or take the whole app down please. 😤😤

Also i need got a virus 😔 it was infected by this Cheeto Puff and he took my money 😔. Me and my FBI agent doesn’t approve🙃.

attributes.title: Very Bad app
attributes.review: This app had a cheeto ad on it, i don’t know why that made me so irrationally angry. Just like trump gets irrationally angry at black people and immigrants, he do be a pedo and racist 🤠🤠But like melly trump is getting her coin bc trump is her sugar daddy. ngl barron trump is kinda cute, i wanna save him from his dad, poor kid is probably all alone and maybe even gets hate bc of his dad. he should just emancipate himself and run away to Gen Z island so he play all the roblox he wants. anyways, ciao, download this app and rate it 1 star and DONT YOU DARE GET RID OF TIK TOK U ORANGE CHEETO😡😡
